options.name: shell-letter-B3
options.choiceDescription: I wonder if he was killed for this letter. But then why is it still here?

options.name: shell-pillow-B4/1
options.choiceDescription: Frank may have been testing muffling the gun shots.

options.name: shell-pillow-B4/2
options.choiceDescription: The murderer must have muffled the gun shot with the pillow.

options.name: shell-gun-B5/1
options.choiceDescription: Frank must be using .44 Magnum when practicing.

options.name: shell-gun-B5/2
options.choiceDescription: It's the most common caliber, everyone could be using it. Even the murderer.

options.name: shell-cigarette-B6
options.choiceDescription: Frank probably didn't finish this cigarette because he wanted to shoot something. Or someone?

Connections.description: I wonder if this shell is recent or was actually stuck in the mop threads for a while.

options.name: shell-mop-B7/1
options.choiceDescription: It's recent.

options.name: shell-mop-B7/2
options.choiceDescription: It was stuck for a while.

Connections.description: Whoever cleaned this floor definitely missed the shell. To be fair, it's hard to notice, yet still.

options.name: shell-floor-B8/1
options.choiceDescription: Frank didn't care enough and he used the gun frequently anyway. Must've been him who mopped last.

options.name: shell-floor-B8/2
options.choiceDescription: The murderer probably tried to clean up, but couldn't find it and thought nobody would. Tough luck, I guess.

Connections.description: Open windows ventilate the area quite well.

options.name: shell-window-B9/1
options.choiceDescription: F.Allen must have used it to ventilate the room after practice.
options.snippet: F.Allen used to ventilate gunpowder smell.

options.name: shell-window-B9/2
options.choiceDescription: The murderer may have wanted to hide the smell of gunpowder.
options.snippet: The murderer tried to get rid of gunpowder smell.

options.name: shell-dummy-B10/1
options.choiceDescription: The caliber fits the size of the holes in the dummy. Allen must have been causing a lot of noise indeed.

options.name: shell-dummy-B10/2
options.choiceDescription: Even though the holes may have been left by bullets of this caliber, it's hard to believe a sane man would shoot in his own house.

options.name: shell-packOfCigs-B11
options.choiceDescription: Frank must have attempted to light up his cigarettes with a gun.
options.snippet: Frank used his gun as a lighter.

Connections.description: The puncture wound is not very big. Just about the right size for .44 magnum.

options.name: shell-bInb-B12/1
options.choiceDescription: I can't believe he would shoot himself...

options.name: shell-bInb-B12/2
options.choiceDescription: The murderer must have used the same type of weapon.

Connections.description: The type of work Frank used to do could cause stress.

options.name: shell-journal-B13/1
options.choiceDescription: Frank was on edge because of his work.

options.name: shell-journal-B13/2
options.choiceDescription: Frank was practicing at home because his work could be dangerous.

options.name: shell-knife-B14
options.choiceDescription: Hold on.. This bullet is out of place. What if I remove that knife... Hah. Either smart or desperately stupid. There's a puncture wound... Or rather - a bullet one.

options.name: letter-pillow-C4
options.choiceDescription: He probably went to sleep in the middle of writing this.

options.name: letter-gun-C5/1
options.choiceDescription: Shooting while writing? I guess he was making noise indeed. That thing ain't quiet.

options.name: letter-gun-C5/2
options.choiceDescription: I think this detective was quite serious with his business. He was ready to solve whatever he needed to solve.

options.name: letter-cigarette-C6
options.choiceDescription: He probably was just smoking and writing this when the murderer came. Must've gone to see what was going on.

options.name: letter-mop-C7
options.choiceDescription: You don't wanna get the letter wet.
options.snippet: Keep the letter away from the mop.

Connections.description: It's strange of Frank to not have finished his letter, given how tidy he was. That is... IF he was tidy.

options.name: letter-floor-C8/1
options.choiceDescription: He was interrupted.

options.name: letter-floor-C8/2
options.choiceDescription: He wasn't tidy.

options.name: letter-window-C9
options.choiceDescription: Maybe the windows are open because Frank used owls to send letters...
options.snippet: Frank used owls to send letters.

options.name: letter-dummy-C10
options.choiceDescription: According to the letter F.Allen was dealing with a lot. He must've loved releasing his frustration on this dummy.
options.snippet: F.Allen released anger on the dummy.

options.name: letter-packOfCigs-C11
options.choiceDescription: Given that amount of problems, no surprise Frank smoked like a factory.

options.name: letter-bInb-C12
options.choiceDescription: He must have tried to end himself to escape all the problems. Very wrong decision which doesn't help.

Connections.description: The letter said he was in the middle of a case or something.

options.name: letter-journal-C13/1
options.choiceDescription: The latest entries must be missing.
options.snippet: Someone tore the latest entries out.

options.name: letter-journal-C13/2
options.choiceDescription: He must've been about to start that case when the murder happened.
options.snippet: F.Allen didn't start his most recent case.

options.name: letter-journal-C13/3
options.choiceDescription: He must have been writing in a different journal or keeping it in his head. He seems to have not been himself lately.
options.snippet: F.Allen wasn't keeping notes of the latest case.

options.name: letter-knife-C14
options.choiceDescription: He must have tried to end himself to escape all the problems. Very wrong decision which doesn't help.

options.name: pillow-gun-D5
options.choiceDescription: If anything, I doubt one can muffle an AutoMag shot with a pillow. You can always try though.
options.snippet: AutoMag is too loud to muffle.

options.name: pillow-cigarette-D6
options.choiceDescription: Allen used to smoke. Maybe at some point he did it in bed? Should've been lucky to not burn the house down.

options.name: pillow-mop-D7
options.choiceDescription: I mean... If you really want to, you could use your pillow as a mop, but Frank at least wasn't that insane.
options.snippet: Frank was OK in his head.

options.name: pillow-floor-D8
options.choiceDescription: Something is off. A seemingly tidy man couldn't change his pillow after it got burnt.
options.snippet: Burnt pillow is out of place.

options.name: pillow-window-D9
options.choiceDescription: Given how much noise Allen was making, I imagine his neighbours had a rough time sleepin. It would only be poetic to try and use a pillow for murder.
options.snippet: Pillow may have been used in murder.

options.name: pillow-dummy-D10
options.choiceDescription: I think F.Allen may have tested noise reduction of a gunshot with a pillow on his dummy.

options.name: pillow-packOfCigs-D11
options.choiceDescription: Having a cigarette pack next to the bed surely says he was doing it here. Must have narrowly avoided an accident.
options.snippet: Frank had a habit of smoking in bed.

options.name: pillow-bInb-D12
options.choiceDescription: Now that I look at it, the pillow burn mark looks like it might've been a result of a gunshot.
options.snippet: Pillow was used as a silencer.

Connections.description: The journal doesn't contain any information about pillows.

options.name: pillow-journal-D13/1
options.choiceDescription: Whatever Frank was doing to this pillow, he didn't come up with a conclusion.

options.name: pillow-journal-D13/2
options.choiceDescription: I doubt Frank would use the pillow for something and not write about it. Surely someone else touched this.
options.snippet: Pillow was used by someone else.

options.name: pillow-knife-D14
options.choiceDescription: If the murder was committed with a knife, why not use a pillow to choke him instead? Leaves fewer tracks.

options.name: gun-cigarette-E6/1
options.choiceDescription: Shooting a gun while smoking a cigarette surely looks badass.

options.name: gun-cigarette-E6/2
options.choiceDescription: I wouldn't dare lighting up my cigarette with a gun. I assume, Frank was reckless.

options.name: gun-mop-E7
options.choiceDescription: I bet he had to clean up a lot if he used this gun indoors.

options.name: gun-floor-E8
options.choiceDescription: The gun is as neatly packed up as his kitchen is clean. The man was weird.

options.name: gun-window-E9/1
options.choiceDescription: If he used to shoot frequently, he may well have been keeping the windows open to ventilate the gunpowder stench.

options.name: gun-window-E9/2
options.choiceDescription: If people are already accusing you of noise, why keep your windows open? Surely someone else opened them.

options.name: gun-dummy-E10
options.choiceDescription: The holes definitely look like they were left by a similar weapon. And the noise complaints... I think the officer was right about home shooting.
options.snippet: Frank did indeed shoot in his place.

options.name: gun-packOfCigs-E11
options.choiceDescription: A gun and a pack of cigarettes - the true toolset of an investigator.

Connections.description: The bullet wound looks like it could've been caused by this weapon.

options.name: gun-knife-E12/1
options.choiceDescription: Suicide? But who put the weapon back in the case then? Must have been someone close.
options.snippet: Suicide. Friend stored the gun after death.

options.name: gun-knife-E12/2
options.choiceDescription: The murderer must have used a similar weapon. Or known of the existence of this one.

options.name: gun-journal-E13
options.choiceDescription: According to his journal, he needed his gun and he needed to be good with it.
options.snippet: Frank was good with his gun.

options.name: gun-knife-E14
options.choiceDescription: If the murderer wanted something from this journal, they could've used that knife better.
options.snippet: The murderer didn't look for the journal.

options.name: cigarette-mop-F7
options.choiceDescription: He must have been mopping a lot to maintain the floor cleanliness with all the ash from the cigarettes.

options.name: cigarette-floor-F8
options.choiceDescription: Regardless of who smoked the cigarette, no one went to the kitchen with it since the murder occurred.

options.name: cigarette-window-F9
options.choiceDescription: The window must be open to let the place ventilate a bit. Regardless of who smoked...
options.snippet: Someone decided to ventilate the smoke.

options.name: cigarette-dummy-F10
options.choiceDescription: Weird the dummy doesn't have any burn marks. I guess Frank cared about his neighbours after all - he didn't want to start a fire.

Connections.description: The cigarette is definitely from this pack.

options.name: cigarette-packOfCigs-F11/1
options.choiceDescription: Whoever smoked it uses the same ones.
options.snippet: Someone smokes the same cigarettes as Allen.

options.name: cigarette-packOfCigs-F11/2
options.choiceDescription: It was Frank who smoked this one.

options.name: cigarette-bInb-F12
options.choiceDescription: That's why smoking is bad... You get shot.

options.name: cigarette-journal-F13
options.choiceDescription: This kind of job would drive anyone crazy. Frank must have been stressed out.

Connections.description: What if it was the murderer who put the cigarette in the ashtray after all? Fire would cover all the tracks if the victim was smoking when murdered.

options.name: cigarette-knife-F14/1
options.choiceDescription: The murderer wanted something in the house and didn't want fire to destroy it.

options.name: cigarette-knife-F14/2
options.choiceDescription: The murderer lives in the same building and didn't want to burn it down.
options.snippet: Murderer lives in the same building.

Connections.description: The mop was definitely used to clean the floor. Though it is slightly wet still.

options.name: mop-floor-G8/1
options.choiceDescription: Frank must have been very particular about keeping the floor clean and the murderer wore no shoes.

options.name: mop-floor-G8/2
options.choiceDescription: Someone else used it recently. Murderer?

options.name: mop-window-G9
options.choiceDescription: With open windows the mop would've dried out much faster...

options.name: mop-dummy-G10
options.choiceDescription: This dummy must have never been cleaned.

Connections.description: Given how much Frank smoked I wouldn't be surprised if he mopped daily. Or never did.

options.name: mop-packOfCigs-G11/1
options.choiceDescription: He mopped daily.

options.name: mop-packOfCigs-G11/2
options.choiceDescription: He never mopped, someone else did.

Connections.description: If there was so much blood after the gunshot and the knife, why did someone mop the kitchen at all?

options.name: mop-bInb-G12/1
options.choiceDescription: The person who mopped arrived at the crime scene after the fact.

options.name: mop-bInb-G12/2
options.choiceDescription: Whoever mopped did it for some other reason.

options.name: mop-journal-G13
options.choiceDescription: The journal is kept quite clean.

options.name: mop-knife-G14
options.choiceDescription: The cloth of the mop can be used to hold the knife without leaving fingerprints.

Connections.description: If you keep the windows open, the floor ain't gonna be clean for long.

options.name: floor-window-H9/1
options.choiceDescription: Maybe that's why Frank is weirdly tidy about certain things?
options.snippet: Open windows made Allen clean up often.

options.name: floor-window-H9/2
options.choiceDescription: Maybe Frank didn't open the windows much?
options.snippet: Frank didn't open the windows often.

options.name: window-packOfCigs-I11
options.choiceDescription: I mean... If you smoke at home frequently, opening the windows makes sense if you don't want to suffocate.

options.name: window-knife-I14
options.choiceDescription: Frank has a gun. If the killer knew it, they could try to sneak up to him and into his house. What's a better way to do it than through a window? Then they could also be wearing gloves to leave no fingerprints...

Connections.description: I can't stop thinking about why someone would thrust a knife into a bullet hole. Did they want to hide the fact that it was a gunshot?

options.name: bInb-knife-L14/1
options.choiceDescription: It's pretty smart.
options.snippet: Knife to cover a bullet? Smart.

options.name: bInb-knife-L14/2
options.choiceDescription: It's pretty stupid.
options.snippet: Knife to cover a bullet? Stupid.
